meanings.definition: A person who has an enthusiastic interest in food.
meanings.sent1: My friend is a real foody and loves trying new restaurants.
meanings.sent2: The foody at the table was excited to order from the extensive menu.
meanings.sent3: The foody couldn't resist the temptation of the delicious dessert.
meanings.sent4: Her reputation as a foody spread through the town like wildfire.
meanings.sent5: Being a foody means always seeking out the best flavors and dishes.

meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of a person who enjoys food.
meanings.sent1: The foody event showcased a variety of tasty treats.
meanings.sent2: She had a foody smile on her face as she took the first bite.
meanings.sent3: The foody aroma coming from the kitchen made everyone's stomachs growl.
meanings.sent4: The foody colors of the dish made it look almost too good to eat.
meanings.sent5: His foody nature led him to explore different cuisines and cooking styles.
